data.text: @JMarkDunlop I always thought and questioned. There are some people who will never change because they don’t want to. Jesus said to move to the next city. Keep trying but not with the same people you’ve told.
@agenda212030 Unwise to call any being a lost cause though too; its not for us to decide .
@agenda212030 Hell the marxist drug-pushing governess here in Oregon is playing the lottery from hell if you just get a jab, you could win a million dollars.  Friggin psycho
@agenda212030 Same !!!!! Done arguing with the dumb and the blind
